data.title: Dialogic Corporation's Statement about IPR related to draft
data.meta_description: IPR disclosure: Dialogic Corporation's Statement about IPR related to draft-saleem-msml-09 (2009)
data.text:
IPR Details

Dialogic Corporation's Statement about IPR related to draft-saleem-msml-09

Disclosure

History

Note: Updates to IPR disclosures must only be made by authorized representatives of the original submitters. Updates will automatically be forwarded to the current Patent Holder's Contact and to the Submitter of the original IPR disclosure.

I. Patent Holder/Applicant ("Patent Holder")

Holder legal name Dialogic Corporation

II. Patent Holder's Contact for License Application

Holder contact name Rick Roos Holder contact email rick.roos@dialogic.com Holder contact info

T: 781-433-9441

III. Contact Information for the IETF Participant Whose Personal Belief Triggered this Disclosure

Name Jeff Van Dyke Email jeff.vandyke@dialogic.com Other info

T: 781-433-9558

IV. IETF Document or Other Contribution to Which this IPR Disclosure Relates

Internet-Draft:

draft-saleem-msml ("Media Server Markup Language (MSML)")

Revisions:

09

V. Disclosure of Patent Information

i.e., patents or patent applications required to be disclosed by RFC 3979 as updated by RFC 4879

A. For granted patents or published pending patent applications, please provide the following information:

Patent, Serial, Publication, Registration, or Application/File number(s)

United States Patent Number 7,590,692

Date: September 15, 2009

Country: United States

B. Does this disclosure relate to an unpublished pending patent application?:

Has patent pending No

VI. Licensing Declaration

The Patent Holder states that its position with respect to licensing any patent claims contained in the patent(s) or patent application(s) disclosed above that would necessarily be infringed by implementation of the technology required by the relevant IETF specification ("Necessary Patent Claims"), for the purpose of implementing such specification, is as follows(select one licensing declaration option only):

Licensing Unwilling to Commit to the Provisions of a), b), or c) Above Licensing information, comments, notes, or URL for further information

(No information submitted)

Note: The individual submitting this template represents and warrants that he or she is authorized by the Patent Holder to agree to the above-selected licensing declaration.

VII. Contact Information of Submitter of this Form

Submitter name Rick Roos Submitter email rick.roos@dialogic.com

Only those sections of the relevant entry form where the submitter provided information are displayed above.
